name: Bless the Queen (KiteRunner, zlimon)
description:
Game was made for Mini jam 106. This jam's theme is Frogs. 

You have to jump, swing and freeze on the path to you love and greatness. 
Game has 6 level, but it will be hard to complete it all because it's a hard game or bad, we don't know :)))

Good luck!

Thanks a lot Craftpix for a tileset.

Yours, KiteRunner and Zlimon
